page.title: 18Beresford Dale.
page.content: The{River Dove}meanders through flower_filled meadows before reaching {Beresford Dale}and the{Charles Cotton and{Izaak Walton Fishing Temple,}built in{1674. There are curious cliff and rock formations and several caves along this beautiful dale, where the trees are a mixture of deciduous and coniferous. Another interesting feature is the famous{Pike Pool}with its spectacular shaft of limestone rock. {Beresford Dale}is a very popular walking area and particularly in the summer months,visitors come from far and wide to enjoy the beauty and tranquillity to be found here. The Dale finishes at a gap in the wall,a bridge and stepping stones.
